name: 8oz. Cupcake Jars
description:
With your choice of our most popular flavors, our cupcakes can now be shipped straight to your door and come in a great, keepsake mason jar. 

8 ounces jars with double layers of cupcake and icing. Perfect for gifts, events or just treating yourself.
 

• Banana Pudding: Banana cream cupcake w/ cream cheese icing and Nilla Wafers crumbles

• Brown Sugar Caramel: Brown sugar cupcakes w/ caramel cream cheese icing and lightly sprinkled with brown sugar

• Chocolate: Ghiradelli© chocolate cupcake w/ chocolate buttercream icing  

• {Vanilla Bean} Coconut: Coconut cupcake w/vanilla cream cheese icing topped with sweet coconut shreds 

• Cookies & Creme: Vanilla cupcake w/ Oreo crumble buttercream icing

• Lemon: Sweet and tangy lemon cupcake w/ lemon cream cheese icing 

• Red Velvet: Classic red velvet w/ cream cheese icing

• Strawberry: Strawberry cupcake w/ fresh strawberry cream cheese icing

• Vanilla: Madagascar bourbon vanilla w/ vanilla buttercream icing

name: Cakeballs
description:
"I don't need the stick. Just give me the pop." Ok! We are happy to oblige.

Treat boxes with nine bite-size cakeballs are an absolute favorite around here. Perfect for any occasion. Moist cake on the inside and coated with a hard vanilla or chocolate shell.

Comes in many flavor varieties and color combos. For a specific color scheme, please email: luvbakes@gmail.com

name: Cupcakes - PICKUP ONLY
description:
We are very proud of our cupcakes and are pleased to share the classic flavors with a LuvBakes twist. Each cupcake is made with premium ingredients and prepared fresh daily. 

*PLEASE NOTE* Cupcakes are only available for pickup in the Maryland area. Minimum order for delivery is one dozen.

$12 half dozen  //  $24 dozen // $15 mini-sampler

• Vanilla: Madagascar bourbon vanilla w/ vanilla buttercream icing

• Red Velvet: Classic red velvet w/ cream cheese icing

• Margarita: Madagascar vanilla cupcake infused with tequila and lime w/ whipped cream icing 

• Strawberry: Strawberry cupcake w/ fresh strawberry cream cheese icing

• Cookies & Creme: Vanilla cupcake w/ Oreo crumble buttercream icing

• Banana Pudding: Banana cream cupcake w/ cream cheese icing and Nilla Wafers crumbles

• Chocolate: Ghiradelli© chocolate cupcake w/ chocolate buttercream icing  

• Coconut: Coconut cupcake w/vanilla cream cheese icing topped with coconut shreds 

• Lemon-Blueberry: Lemon cupcake w/ blueberry cream cheese icing

• White Chocolate Raspberry: Madagascar bourbon vanilla cupcake w/ raspberry & white chocolate buttercream icing

• Mini-Sampler 1 // four mini cupcakes of each: Strawberry, Chocolate and Red Velvet

• Mini-Sampler 2 // four mini cupcakes of each: Lemon-Blueberry, Banana Pudding and White Chocolate Raspberry

__________________________________________

Cupcake Toppers: Use your own image and have your edible toppers fully customize your cupcakes. Toppers are 2" in diameter and fit on standard size cupcakes. These come by the dozen and take 7-business days for production so please factor that in to your ordering time. 

Custom Designs: Additional designs to cupcakes are $3.50/each. Please contact us with what you want on your cupcakes and we will send an invoice for your order.

name: Cookies
description:
Red Velvet: A southern style favorite. Red Velvet cookies mixed with cream cheese icing and drizzled with white chocolate. 

Banana Pudding: I never imagined a cookie tasting like the classic, banana pudding dessert but these hit the mark! Soft, chewy cookies with white chocolate chips and Nilla Wafer crumbles.

Chocolate Chip: Chocolate Chip always feels like home. This classic recipe is deliciously chewy and available in chocolate or white chocolate to suit your taste.

Strawberry: Light, sweet and highly addictive. These soft, strawberry cookies are always a good choice. 

Snickerdoodle: "It's like a Cinnabon in a cookie!" My mother knows best. These Snickerdooodles are fresh, soft and chewy with an incredible flavor.


Each pack includes 6 cookies.

name: Cakepops
description:
Perfect little treats for any occasion. Moist cake on the inside and coated with a hard vanilla or chocolate shell. 

Comes in many flavor varieties and color combos. For a specific color scheme, please email: luvbakes@gmail.com

Orders come by the dozen

name: Milk Chocolate Cheesecake Brownies
description:
These brownies are topped with a creamy cheesecake mixture that perfectly pairs with the rich milk chocolate. They are chewy and moist and decadent and just... amazing. Absolutely no box mix here. 

Each order comes with three, large brownie squares that are individually wrapped to preserve freshness.

name: Holiday Gift Boxes
description:
Only 10 available

• Two 8oz. Red Velvet Cupcake Jars
• One Dozen Soft Gingersnap Cookies
• One Dulce de Leche Brownie Square

Comes in a holiday box with red and green ribbon and a personalized message on a festive card. Send your message to luvbakes@gmail.com after purchase.

Orders can be shipped on a specific date if you would like them delivered right before Christmas.
